description: Jeeya Lend Oodles Of Sophistication And Class To Your Kitchen And Dining Table By Grabbing This Twenty Four Piece Designer Cutlery Set From The Renowned Brand Of Logo. Comprising Six Units Each Of Tea Spoons, Baby Spoons, Forks And Large Spoons. It Comes With A Durable Steel Stand That Is Adorned With A Colored Stone. Brand :Jeeya Made Of : Stainless Steel. Inclusive Of : 24 Pcs (6 Tea Spoons, 6 Baby Spoons, 6 Forks, 6 Large Spoons And A Stand).Other Features : Durable Construction. An Ideal Kitchen Commodity. Great Gifting Option. Disclaimer: Actual Product Colors/Size/Design May Vary From The Picture Shown Above.
